sections.heading: Policies; applicability of sections
sections.text: Sections 44-3401 to 44-3408 shall apply to all policies, except:(1) Any policy which is a security subject to federal jurisdiction;(2) Any group policy covering a group of one thousand or more lives at date of issue, other than a group credit life insurance policy
